logo.name: Logo for Edmonton Transit App
logo.description: The logo represents effortless and accessible transit services for the citizens of Edmonton.

sections.title: Edmonton Transit Access Made Easy!
sections.subtitle: Register Today for Free Bus and Wheelchair Transport Services
sections.name: Header
sections.label: Home
sections.content: Welcome to the Edmonton Transit App, your gateway to accessible and cost-free public transportation across our vibrant city. Whether you're a veteran needing support, an elder navigating daily travels, or living within an income threshold, our platform ensures you get moving without financial burden. Register now and unlock transport freedom today!

images.name: Edmonton Cityscape
images.description: A panoramic view of Edmonton showcasing its dynamic cityscape with modern architectural charm.

sections.title: About Our Initiative
sections.subtitle: Empowering Communities Through Accessibility
sections.name: About
sections.label: About
sections.content: The Edmonton Transit App is a visionary program rooted in community welfare, aiming to make public transport accessible to all Edmontonians who need it the most. Our mission is to provide support and ease for eligible citizens, enhancing their mobility with complimentary bus and wheelchair transport services. We believe in equal opportunities for transit, ensuring that every qualified individual can travel effortlessly and efficiently within the city limits.

images.name: Community Engagement
images.description: An image depicting diverse groups of people happily engaging in community activities enabled by accessible transport.

sections.title: Our Services at a Glance
sections.subtitle: Free Transport Options Tailored for You
sections.name: Services
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
Our application offers flexible and inclusive services designed to serve:  
- **Persons with Disabilities:** Access enhanced transport services catering to specific needs.  
- **Elder Citizens:** Smooth transit options that remove the hurdle of travel costs.  
- **Military Veterans:** A small token of appreciation for those who served.  
- **Low-Income Households:** Ensure affordability doesn’t impede your journeys.  

Each service is crafted to ensure a seamless, dignifying experience for the users.

images.name: Accessibility Icons
images.description: Icons representing various accessible transport options available.

sections.title: Get in Touch
sections.subtitle: We’re Here to Help
sections.name: Contact
sections.label: Contact
sections.content:
Whether you have questions about registration, eligibility criteria, or need assistance in navigating the app, our friendly support team is just a message away.  

**Contact us through:**  
- **Email:** support@edmontontransitapp.com  
- **Phone:** +1 (123) 456-7890  
- **Address:** City Hall, 1 Sir Winston Churchill Square, Edmonton, AB T5J 2R7  

Join us in our commitment to providing inclusive transit solutions across Edmonton. Connect with us today!

images.name: Map of Location
images.description: A map showing the location of City Hall for in-person inquiries.

sections.title: See the Impact
sections.subtitle: Our Beneficiaries' Stories
sections.name: Testimonials
sections.label: Stories
sections.content:
Here’s what our valued users have to say:  

“I’ve experienced newfound independence thanks to this incredible service.” — *Samantha, Elder Citizen*  
“Being able to contribute to my community with ease and without financial strain has transformed my life.” — *Mark, Veteran*  

Join the multitude benefiting from accessible transport today!

images.name: User Portraits
images.description: Photos of satisfied users sharing their experiences with the service.
